pullrequest.title: Pose frame semantics: describe legacy behavior

content.raw:
My only concern is that doc tackles a _lot_ of \(or rather, more than presently useful?\) behavior \(e.g. explicit \+ implicit name scoping for composition\).

It would be nice to carve out the immediate functionality needs in a more focused fashion.

Is there a way that this can be accommodated by that design doc, or making a new design doc? \(If not, perhaps it’d be OK to just stick with the tutorial format, and then later compose it into a design doc?\)
content.html:
My only concern is that doc tackles a lot of (or rather, more than presently useful?) behavior (e.g. explicit + implicit name scoping for composition).

It would be nice to carve out the immediate functionality needs in a more focused fashion.

Is there a way that this can be accommodated by that design doc, or making a new design doc? (If not, perhaps it’d be OK to just stick with the tutorial format, and then later compose it into a design doc?)
